pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3287 S5122 should only raise when all origins are allowed

commit.message: SONARJAVA-3287 S5122 should only raise when all origins are allowed

nodes.bodyText:
This is to support the case:

CorsConfiguration: raises only when addAllowedOrigin("*")

This is to support the case:

HttpServletResponse: raise only when "Access-Control-Allow-Origin" header is set to "*"
I juste realized that the key value is an alias for origins, this one, and a few following ones are in fact compliant!
